channel.title: O3noBLOG: Microfeed for "Everything You Know About CSS Is Wrong 書評"
channel.description: Comments for the entry "Everything You Know About CSS Is Wrong 書評"

item.title: Comment from Alica
item.description: 將就用就好啦……Pixmicat!的預設樣式是我把table排版改成CSS的，不過看來看去最後還是得開table display才能達到原先的效果，那也只能繼續table下去。只能說大家都被制約了～
